panels.description: This tends to happen when there are issues with the Bedrock Service and throttling is taking place

targets.expression:
fields @timestamp, @message |
filter errorCode like /Exception/ |
stats count(*) as error by bin(1h), errorCode

panels.title: Bedrock Service Exceptions

FE HTTP Requests Per Second Breakdown

targets.expr: avg by(container) (container_memory_working_set_bytes{job="kubelet", metrics_path="/metrics/cadvisor", namespace="apps", pod=~"govuk-chat-.{8,10}-.{5}", container=~"app|nginx"})
